nodes.text: The Three was the main governing body of the planet Voss and the Voss species. They duty were also the interpretation of the Mystics' visions and their diffusion; the Three based their executive orders upon the visions' interpretations. The Three were chosen by the Mystics after meditation or according to visions, but had little direct contact with them on a day-to-day basis. Working from the Tower of Prophecy, the Three administered Voss-Ka and made policy decisions. Depending on the advice of the Mystics, appointment to the Three lasted either a lifetime or just hours. The members during the Cold War were Sonn-Vi, Gunta-Mer, and Nen-Ji.
